Public Member Functions

TTSymbol & lookup (const char *string)
 Look in the symbol table for this string.

Detailed Description

The current implementation of this TTSymbolTable class is somewhat crude and really slow and it should be improved in the future.

It has an internal table that is implemented as a fixed array. Each symbol is identified by its index in this array.

Member Function Documentation

TTSymbol& TTSymbolTable::lookup ( const char *  string  ) 

Look in the symbol table for this string.

If it exists then return its id. If it does not exist then it is created, added to the symbol table and this new symbol's id is returned.

This lookup is called directly, but also from the TTSymbol constructor, which allows us to call methods expecting a TTSymbol by passing them simple c strings.
